Name: Bagels & Beans

100% recommend.
BEST bagel I've ever had!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Reliable food quality, friendly patient staff, fair prices. Can’t go wrong if you fancy tasty bagels and organic coffee from a small farm in Panama.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely brekkie at B&B and friendly staff, quick service. I always feel welcome at this location.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE bagels! So many different options and all so tasty! Their large cappuccino is fantastic! Love the many vegetarian options, the green/ environmentally friendly silverware! The staff is very friendly and kind! Also love the ambience and clean bathrooms!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: If you live for bagels and breakfast drinks and don't stop by here you are seriously missing out. My wife and I love this location especially because it's out of the center. So tourists if are wandering in the neighborhoods you may get that …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Having lived in North America for many years and enjoying amazing bagels from so many different bakeries, I was hopeful here. Unfortunately the bagels were not that good and barely toasted. Positive here is good choice for vegans with vegan …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A nice cafe with at least one surprise on the menu. BUGS! This is the first place I've come across that sells bagels filled with (dead) grubs and crickets. One of the crickets was about 4-5cm long. A monster! …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagel and Beans is a charming little bagel del8, serving salmon and cream cheese on a variety of bagels with all the trimmings.  They also have great coffee drinks and other food as well. Plenty of outdoor seating and friendly service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very friendly staff and great food at affordable prices. The menu hosts some fantastic selections of foods, from the classic cheese toastie bagel to a bug bagel consisting of meal worms and crickets (see photos). …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Very nice atmosphere, very friend staff.
The offer has quite some vegan and vegetarian options. We ordered the Avocado Pana and it was delicious. …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place in Amsterdam to go for a lunch!  Especially if its sunny because you can sit outside on the terrace,, I had the (sundried) tomato bagel with portobello mushroom burger and parmesan cheese<< one of my fav. Its so good! Oh yeah I also had a craving for the Matcha Soy Latte =)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great bagels, lovely juices and coffee and caring staff. Recommended for lunch near Vondelpark

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely place to get a bit of breakfast before heading into the okd city vis tram. Staff are really nice, and the hot chocolate is excellent!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A diamond in Amsterdam. Vegan friendly options, great coffee, and delicious bagels. I'd eat here every day!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Cool place with great atmosphere, the staff was super nice :)
The coffee was great and the salmon bagel was delicious.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Always great food with food for everyone (gluten free, vegetarian etc.), big cups of coffee, and very friendly staff

Name: Bagels & Beans

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good music, good service good place loveid it so far!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Smoked chicken and avocado bagel. Absolutely delicious!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Great place with good atmosphere!
If you're looking for something good in the middle of the chaos, this is the place

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Breakfast isn’t the Dutch “fuerte” but this place is a safe bet when it comes to easy coffee and friendly service. It’s a chain so it might not be as cozy as other more coffee specialized tents but they offer a wide variety of bagels and …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: To noisy for a a cafe bar , when there to have a coffee and meanwhile also work. Had a company call and couldn't hear anything. Apart of that great coffee and good bagels!.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice tea, salmon and avocado salad is very good. Not just a bagel place.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Today, I had to wait for 10+ minutes to get a coffee. There was no queue but the 3 people behind the counter were busy doing bagels for online orders

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels and Beans was definitely one of the highlights of Amsterdam, as far as breakfast and lunch goes. Their bagels are very unique and tasty and there are lots of customisable flavour combinations. Apart from the fresh ingredients, the …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice tasty bagels, great coffee, and smiling staff. I had a smoked salmon bagel, a fresh orange and carrot juice, and an espresso. It was all up to expectations. Cozy place with many seats.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great cappuccinos and delicious bagel sandwiches. And kid friendly service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very slow service and not tasty bagels at all

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The best way to start your day in Amsterdam, with a bagel and salmon!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Coffee was amazing!! Great selection of beagles, had a nice option with cream cheese and sundried tomatoes. The place itself is very clean and even tho I came just as they were opening in the morning the staff was friendly and welcoming, actually they made my stay in Amsterdam memorable for good service

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I like the menu here.   Thete is something for every kind of eater. The bagels are not exactly NY style,  but they are compete and tasty.  My 6yr old orders her bagel with a side of crickets and meakworms every time and the server looks dismayed and says "does she know they are real," oh yes she does!!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice lunchroom located at a nice spot near Amsterdam centrum. The staff is friendly, but a little young and unexperienced. The food is great, but a little overpriced. All in all, the branch is all over town. It's a great spot to have a coffee, eat something and work behind your laptop.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I didn't know bagels can be like this! Sunny staff creates a delightful atmosphere and the classical music, fruits and flowers just amplify it. I wish it was open earlier

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good choice of different sorts of bagel and great variety of filling. Tasty juices and good coffee. Plenty of customers making use of the free WiFi. Friendly and quick service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Very nice place to have breakfast in Amsterdam. I took a bagel with avocado and other stuck, and i really loved it.
Price was 11€ i think for the bagel and an orange juice.
Service was on point with very kind personal.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere and staff who go the extra mile. Ordered the Meatless Magic Burger and a Flat white, both very good and plenty of other vegan and non vegan options.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: B&B is some sort of a neo hippie joint for people who have moved up in social status. Marcuse would call it repressed tolerance! We think it's freedom. Enjoy your coffee with a bagel!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Top notch ingredients with good combinations make for some of the best tasting bagel sandwichs you'll find anywhere! Good fresh juice and quality service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Simple, fresh and honest food.  I love how they tell you everything about their suppliers in the menu, they use local ingredients and prices are correct.
However it might get really busy sometimes and the service is not always ready …

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I come here often and enjoy it every time. Relaxed atmosphere, good coffee,  tasty bagels (chicken chutney!). Staff is always nice and friendly.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The coffee was quite nice. They ran out of 4 different cakes that were on the menu, so I had to settle for the fig cake which I didn’t really like. That’s a lot of cakes to run out of.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely place to study or simply hang out. I have always experienced great, friendly service. The food and drinks are delicious and priced well. Free wi-fi and there always seems to be a place to sit even when it's busy.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great bagels & beans right next to vondelpark! Very relaxed with friendly staff. Wi-Fi can be a bit slow however. Also the large cappuccinos are huge!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place where you can try bagels! Usually, I go for the breakfast, I eat the bagel with cheese cream and jam, orange juice and a warm drink! It is not expensive!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Individual restaurant flare for a chain. Good coffee, great food selection, tasty European take on bagels. Friendly staff as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels & Beans is a network of stylish breakfast places with awesome interiors, pleasant staff and tasty bagels, salads, juice, tea, coffee and other breakfast stuff.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice place for breakfeast or brunch. There's vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options and everything is delicious. Good coffee. Friendly service.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Their specials are really good value for money. Our waitress was very friendly. Lovely and cosy inside on a cold day.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We had a great breakfast here. Will definitely visit it again when I'm back in Amsterdam!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels and more await you, at a cozy and relaxing atmosphere, along with freshly prepared beverages. A must “eat”.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cute spot to stop for a bagel and some tea (or coffee!) in the morning. Everyone was incredible friendly and helpful.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Loved the large mocha and the chicken bagel! Lovely staff and amazing service. Will visit again once back in the Netherlands
